text: Abkhazian Dze (Ӡ ӡ; italics: Ӡ ӡ) is a letter of the Cyrillic script. It is used in the Abkhazian language where it makes the sound [ds] like in "kids", it is also used in the Uilta language. This letter was also used in one 1937 proposal (not adopted) for the Karelian language. Category:Cyrillic letters
title: Abkhazian Dze
